title: Coastal Group Apartment Stay in the Heart of Port Stephens
description: Dive into a coastal nirvana blessed with spectacular scenery, white-sand beaches, dramatic sand dunes plunging into clear emerald waters and a lagoon-style pool at Mantra Nelson Bay in Port Stephens. Experience a revitalising seaside escape just a seven-minute stroll from Fly Point beach and a short five-minute drive to the surf havens of Fingal and One Mile. After busy days exploring, kick back in a Two-Bedroom Apartment with early check-in and late checkout on request, subject to availability.
offer_address: 1A Tomaree Street, Nelson Bay, New South Wales 2315, Australia

title: Coastal Two-Bedroom Apartment Stay for up to Four Guests in the Heart of Port Stephens
description:
Escape to a coastal nirvana with a stay at Mantra Nelson Bay, set among the white-sand beaches, dramatic sand dunes and clear emerald waters of Port Stephens. A stylish collection of fully equipped modern apartments with a relaxing lagoon-style pool, this revitalising seaside escape is the perfect place for extended romantic weekends or fun-filled family escapes, set in a prime location just hop, skip and jump from Fly Point beach and the surf havens of Fingal Bay and One Mile Beach.

Head out on a dolphin- or whale-watching cruise (seasonal), go quad biking across the sand dunes or explore myriad nature trails and shimmering beaches - Port Stephens has it all. After they day's adventures, rejuvenate your way with the hotel's generous offering of resort-style facilities, from the Jacuzzi and fitness centre, to the BBQ areas perfect for entertaining the whole family.
offer_address: 1A Tomaree Street, Nelson Bay, New South Wales 2315, Australia

title: Relaxing Coastal Escape in Nelson Bay, NSW
description: Escape to the breathtaking Nelson Bay in Port Stephens - a scenic 2.5-hour drive from Sydney - and soak up the white sand beaches, dramatic sand dunes and clear aquamarine waters, home to incredible bottlenose dolphins and humpback whales. Spend three nights in a self-contained room at The Landmark and enjoy a bottle of wine and chocolates, and  a cheese platter with a glass of bubbly at the local golf course.

title: Spectacular Coastal Escape at Nelson Bay
description: Escape to the breathtaking Nelson Bay in Port Stephens - a scenic 2.5-hour drive from Sydney - and soak up spectacular scenery with white sand beaches, dramatic sand dunes and clear aquamarine waters, home to incredible bottlenose dolphins and humpback whales. Stay for four days/three nights in a self-contained Two-Bedroom Apartment at the Mantra Aqua Nelson Bay resort with savings on exciting local experiences such as Hunter Valley wine tours and cruises for just $299 for up to four people, valued up to $938.

title: Coastal Apartment Stay in the Heart of Port Stephens
description:
Dive into a coastal nirvana blessed with spectacular scenery, white-sand beaches and dramatic sand dunes plunging into clear emerald waters at Mantra Nelson Bay in Port Stephens. Complete with a stylish collection of fully equipped one, two and three-bedroom apartments, a relaxing lagoon-style pool and prime location just a short stroll from Fly Point beach and a short 15-minute drive to the surf havens of Fingal Bay and One Mile Beach, this revitalising seaside escape is the perfect place for extended romantic weekends or fun-filled family escapes. Head out on a dolphin or whale-watching cruise (seasonal), go quad biking across sand dunes or explore myriad nature trails and shimmering beaches - Port Stephens has it all.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Extend that holiday feeling with early check-in and late checkout (subject to availability)

**Travelling with family or friends?** There's plenty of room to spread out and unwind when you upgrade to a Two-Bedroom Apartment for up to four or a Three-Bedroom Apartment for up to six guests.

**Penthouse Upgrade**: If you're feeling extra lavish, indulge with the Three-Bedroom Penthouse Apartment, featuring a private top-floor balcony offering a bird's-eye view over the entire resort, Nelson Bay and the stunning blue waters, and ducted air-conditioning throughout.

**Mystery Picnic Upgrade:** Explore local highlights and uncover hidden gourmet food spots when you upgrade to the Mystery Picnic package. Beginning in the Mantra Nelson Bay lobby, this tour invites you to have fun solving riddles as you embark on a journey to collect gourmet picnic delights one by one, with each clue leading you closer to your next picnic food pick-up (available for Two-Bedroom Pool-View and Three-Bedroom Standard Apartments only).
offer_address: 1A Tomaree Street, Nelson Bay, New South Wales 2315, Australia

title: Stunning Coastal Getaway - Mantra Aqua Nelson Bay
description: Dive into a magical stay at the spectacular Mantra Aqua Nelson Bay and enjoy all the coastal attractions available. The quintessential NSW resort town, Nelson Bay is a mecca for sun and surf worshippers and families after a spot of aquatic adventure with the young ones. Enjoy relaxing walks along glorious stretches of pristine sandy beaches, ride the waves like a pro, or play spot-the-dolphin with the kids aboard a catamaran. Stay in a two-bedroom apartment and enjoy incredible savings on local experiences, including an award-winning brewery tour and tasting, spa credits, shark and stingray experiences, and more.
